veg_appetizers.name: Chatpat (V)
veg_appetizers.description: Roasted or fried ingredients in puffed rice and chickpeas, with flavorful spices, onions, and cucumbers.

veg_appetizers.name: Chinese Bhel (V)
veg_appetizers.description: Famous street-style snack with fresh onions, cucumber, and herbs.

veg_appetizers.name: Spicy Mustang Aloo (V)
veg_appetizers.description: Spiced potato wedges made with local spices from the Mustang region in Nepal.

veg_appetizers.name: Onion Pakoda (V)
veg_appetizers.description: Fried battered golden fritters made with fresh onion.

veg_appetizers.name: Aloo Achar (V)
veg_appetizers.description: Potatoes infused with the flavor of fenugreek, combined with spicy chilies, aromatic onions, and garlic.

veg_appetizers.name: Bhatmas Sadeko (V)
veg_appetizers.description: Roasted and marinated soybean snack with spring onions and chilies.

non_veg_appetizers.name: Chicken Sekuwa
non_veg_appetizers.description: Marinated chicken skewers in Nepalese spice blend.

non_veg_appetizers.name: Chicken Choila
non_veg_appetizers.description: Boneless grilled meat with chili, garlic, ginger, green onion infused in mustard oil.

non_veg_appetizers.name: Lamb Tass
non_veg_appetizers.description: Tender slices of boneless lamb marinated in traditional Nepali herbs and spices, slow-cooked to perfection.

non_veg_appetizers.name: Chilly Chicken
non_veg_appetizers.description: Sweet, spicy, and slightly sour crispy chicken with bell peppers, garlic, soy sauce.

non_veg_appetizers.name: Chilly Fish
non_veg_appetizers.description: Crispy fish with bell peppers, garlic, soy sauce, and sweet, spicy sauce.

veg_mains.name: Manchurian (V)
veg_mains.description: Veggie balls in a flavorful sauce with hot, sweet, sour, and salty flavors.

veg_mains.name: Yellow Dal Tadka (V)
veg_mains.description: Slow-cooked yellow lentils with onion and tomato, finished with a tempering made of ghee and spices.

veg_mains.name: Raioo (V)
veg_mains.description: Stir-fried mustard greens with garlic and ginger.

veg_mains.name: Aloo Mattar Paneer
veg_mains.description: Cottage cheese, potatoes, and green peas simmered in a tomato-onion gravy with aromatic house spices and herbs.

veg_mains.name: Aloo Bodi Tama (V)
veg_mains.description: Black-eyed peas, fermented bamboo shoots, and potatoes in light Himalayan spices; a typical Nepali taste.

veg_mains.name: Masala Pasta
veg_mains.description: Tomato-based pasta tossed with mixed vegetables in Indian spices.

non_veg_mains.name: Chicken Manchurian
non_veg_mains.description: Chicken balls in a flavorful sauce with hot, sweet, sour, and salty flavors.

non_veg_mains.name: Chicken Chettinad
non_veg_mains.description: Chicken prepared with freshly ground coconut and a variety of spices; highly rated.

non_veg_mains.name: Village Goat Curry
non_veg_mains.description: Traditional village-style goat cooked in whole spices and mustard oil.

non_veg_mains.name: Butter Chicken
non_veg_mains.description: Spiced chicken cubes simmered in creamy tomato sauce; an absolute favorite.

non_veg_mains.name: Chicken Masala Pasta
non_veg_mains.description: Tomato-based pasta tossed with mixed vegetables and chicken in Indian spices.

rice_fried_rice.name: Calcutta Chicken Biryani
rice_fried_rice.description: A delicious combination of rice, chicken, potatoes, and eggs, cooked in the Calcutta style.

rice_fried_rice.name: Goat Biryani
rice_fried_rice.description: Spiced and fragrant layers of biryani rice centered with juicy, tender goat meat and spices.
